item.title: The Greedy Cave
item.description: The Greedy Cave is an ARPG{: target="_blank"}. Ready your spells, sharpen your swords, boost your stats, enchant your equipement, study your enemies and beat the crap out of that dungeon !! If you like Diablo{: target="_blank"} or Torchlight{: target="_blank"}, the greedy cave is made for you !

item.title: Digfender
item.description: Digfender is the best tower defense I played in 2015. It’s not a creative game, it doesn’t have any surprises, but it’s well executed and perfectly balanced. All the towers are usefull, each specialisation has it’s importance, and there isn’t one better than the others. The gameplay is deep and has a lot of variety.
